Package de.xeinfach.kafenio.util

Class Summary
Base64Codec Description: Base64 Encoder/Decoder class.
HTMLTranslate HTMLTranslate numeric character references and character entity references to unicode characters.
LeanLogger Created on: Jan 30, 2004, 6:36:09 PM Description: a lean logger class that supports 5 diferent log levels (debug, info, warn, error and none) and logs all messages to System.out.
ListLoader This is a static utility class used to load a list of images or links or whatever from the server.
Translatrix Description: This class translates string-ids into language specific messages.
TreeSpider * Description: TreeSpider Utility class for traversing, scanning & describing directory/file structures * * @author Howard Kistler
Utils Static utility class with miscellaneous functions.
